text:
Kapten Song menangkap burung pegar itu, kenapa kamu tidak pergi dan bertanya untuk itu secara langsung!" [redacted_name] berkata dengan marah.
Keluarga [redacted_name] terbiasa hangat dan bahagia, tapi saya benar-benar tidak tahu apa yang dipikirkan sebagian orang di desa, yang bersikeras membuat masalah di belakang mereka.
Itu tidak lebih dari kecemburuan terhadap kehidupan baik orang lain.
Namun jika keluarganya memiliki kondisi dan kemampuan, mereka akan diberikan kelahiran yang baik!
Keadaan setiap orang berbeda-beda, lalu mengapa banyak sekali gosip?
“Saya tidak bercanda,”
kata [redacted_name] sinis, tetapi mendapat banyak tatapan kosong, dia merasa sedih, tetapi dia hanya bisa membungkuk dan bekerja.
Setelah menerima kabar tersebut, [redacted_name] meletakkan pekerjaannya, mencatat poin pekerjaannya, dan dengan senang hati pulang untuk membantu.
Saat ini, Song Ji sudah mulai menggali ubi.
Tanaman merambatnya sangat lebat dan ubinya tidak kecil.
trans:
"Captain Song caught the pheasant, why don't you go and ask by yourself!" asked [redacted_name] angrily.
[redacted_name]'s family was usually warm and happy, but I truly had no idea what some people in the village were thinking, insisting on causing trouble behind their backs.
It's nothing more than jealousy of other's people good lives.
However, if their family had the conditions and capabilities, they would have been given a good life!
Everyone's situation was different, so why was there so much gossip?
"I'm not joking,"
said [redacted_name] sarcastically, but received many blank stares. She felt sad, yet could only bow and continue working.
After receiving the news, [redacted_name] put down her work, made a note of the tasks, and happily went home to help.
At this moment, Song Ji had started digging up sweet potatoes.
Their creeping plants are very dense and the sweet potatoes are quite large.
